dotnetType.name: DurationDeserializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DurationLogicalType" /> and attempts to
            map it to <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.

overloads.summary: Creates a new duration deserializer builder case.

returns.summary: A function that accepts a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and returns a deserialized object.

overloads.summary: Builds a duration deserializer for a type-schema pair.
The codec that generated deserializers should use for read operations.

returns.summary:
Whether the schema is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.FixedSchema" /> with size 12 and logical type
            <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DurationLogicalType" />.

overloads.summary: Determines whether the case can be applied to a schema.
Determines whether the case can be applied to a type resolution.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DurationDeserializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinaryDeserializerBuilderCase
